testcase.system-out: Given User creates the getQuotes api request payload with filter as "author" with value as "Helmut Schmidt","page" with value as "1" and "tags" with value as "famous-quotes,wisdom".passed When User sends the request.................................................passed Then Verify that the status code is 200.....................................passed Then Verify that the response has field "page" and value is "1".............passed Then Verify that the response has field "results" as empty list.............passed And Verify the json schema for the response as "getQuotesNoResults".........passed
